SELECT /* acmdCerfAddrListCountSelect */ COUNT(*) FROM tpost.TB_ACMD_CERF_MGNT M ,tpost.TB_OFAP_ELCT_ADDR A ,tpost.TB_RCVE_CI_INFO B WHERE M.APCT_DATE BETWEEN #{inputRengStDt} AND #{inputRengClosDt} AND A.OFAP_ELCT_ADDR = M.OFAP_ELCT_ADDR AND A.CI_NUM = B.CI_NUM
AND M.ISS_CLS = #{inputIssCls}
AND OEA.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{inputName}, '%')
AND M.OFAP_ELCT_ADDR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{inputOfapElctAddr}, '%')
AND B.CI_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{inputCiNum}, '%')

SELECT /* downloadCheck */ OGAN_CD AS oganCd ,TMPLT_CD AS tmpltCd ,TRANS_DT AS TrnsDate ,ACMD_CERF_SEQ AS acmdCerfSeq ,OFAP_ELCT_ADDR AS ofapElctAddr FROM tpost.TB_ACMD_CERF_MGNT WHERE ISS_CLS = '400' AND APCT_CLS = '1' AND DWLD_URL = #{dwldUrl}
